com.iha.emulator.ui.panels.chart

Class ResponseChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.ui.panels.chart.ResponseChart

  • public class ResponseChart
extends java.lang.Object
    Graphical component class providing graph, which displays Responses gathered by ResponseTracker.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky
